html_analysis.html_content:
GENERAL STATUTES
OF
CONNECTICUT

Revised to January 1, 2025



(Prepared under the direction of the Legislative Commissioners’ Office)

T I T L E S


(The volume numbers appearing below correspond to the volumes of the printed General Statutes)

V O L U M E    1
Title 1 Chapters 1 to 15e
(Secs. 1-1 to 1-500)		 Provisions of General Application
Title 2 Chapters 16 to 23l
(Secs. 2-1 to 2-139)		 General Assembly and Legislative Agencies
Title 2a Chapters 24 to 25 Reserved for future use
Title 2b Chapters 26 to 27 Reserved for future use
Title 2c Chapters 28 to 28a
(Secs. 2c-1 to 2c-21)		 Review and Termination of Governmental Entities and Programs
Title 3 Chapters 31 to 35
(Secs. 3-1 to 3-131)		 State Elective Officers
Title 4 Chapters 46 to 55e
(Secs. 4-1 to 4-289)		 Management of State Agencies
Title 4a Chapters 57 to 58a
(Secs. 4a-1 to 4a-101)		 Administrative Services
Title 4b Chapters 59 to 60a
(Secs. 4b-1 to 4b-136)		 State Real Property
Title 4c Repealed Business Regulation. Department of Business Regulation (All sections repealed or obsolete)
Title 4d Chapters 61 to 61c
(Secs. 4d-1 to 4d-100)		 State Information and Telecommunication Systems
Title 4e Chapters 62 to 62a
(Secs. 4e-1 to 4e-76)		 State Contracting
Title 5 Chapters 63 to 68
(Secs. 5-1 to 5-280)		 State Employees
Title 6 Chapters 76 to 79
(Secs. 6-1 to 6-76)		 Counties and County Officers. Judicial and State Marshals
V O L U M E    2
Title 7 Chapters 90 to 119a
(Secs. 7-1 to 7-623)		 Municipalities
Title 8 Chapters 124 to 138n
(Secs. 8-1 to 8-452)		 Zoning, Planning, Housing and Economic and Community Development
V O L U M E    3
Title 9 Chapters 141 to 158
(Secs. 9-1 to 9-760)		 Elections
Title 10 Chapters 163 to 184c
(Secs. 10-1 to 10-550i)		 Education and Culture
Title 10a Chapters 185 to 187c
(Secs. 10a-1 to 10a-263)		 State System of Higher Education
Title 11 Chapters 188 to 194
(Secs. 11-1 to 11-89)		 Libraries and Museums
V O L U M E    4
Title 12 Chapters 201 to 229b
(Secs. 12-1 to 12-872)		 Taxation
Title 13 Chapters 231 to 235
(Secs. 13-1 to 13-249)		 Highways and Bridges (All sections repealed or obsolete)
Title 13a Chapters 236 to 241
(Secs. 13a-1 to 13a-269)		 Highways and Bridges
Title 13b Chapters 242 to 245c
(Secs. 13b-1 to 13b-415)		 Transportation
V O L U M E    5
Title 14 Chapters 246 to 256
(Secs. 14-1 to 14-399)		 Motor Vehicles. Use of the Highway By Vehicles. Gasoline
Title 15 Chapters 263 to 269
(Secs. 15-1 to 15-232)		 Navigation and Aeronautics
Title 16 Chapters 277 to 293
(Secs. 16-1 to 16-359)		 Public Service Companies
Title 16a Chapters 295 to 298b
(Secs. 16a-1 to 16a-120)		 Planning and Energy Policy
V O L U M E    6
Title 17 Chapters 299 to 318c
(Secs. 17-1 to 17-675)		 Public Assistance and Welfare Services (All sections transferred, repealed or obsolete)
Title 17a Chapters 319 to 319l
(Secs. 17a-1 to 17a-899)		 Social and Human Services and Resources
Title 17b Chapters 319o to 319yy
(Secs. 17b-1 to 17b-895)		 Social Services
Title 18 Chapters 320 to 327
(Secs. 18-1 to 18-107)		 Correctional Institutions and Department of Correction
Title 19 Chapters 333 to 367
(Secs. 19-1 to 19-626d)		 Public Health and Safety (All sections transferred, repealed or obsolete)
Title 19a Chapters 368a to 368ll
(Secs. 19a-1 to 19a-918)		 Public Health and Well-Being
V O L U M E    7
Title 20 Chapters 369 to 400p
(Secs. 20-1 to 20-691)		 Professional and Occupational Licensing, Certification, Title Protection and Registration. Examining Boards
Title 21 Chapters 403 to 414b
(Secs. 21-1 to 21-121)		 Licenses
Title 21a Chapters 416 to 420l
(Secs. 21a-1 to 21a-446)		 Consumer Protection
V O L U M E    8
Title 22 Chapters 422 to 438d
(Secs. 22-1 to 22-457)		 Agriculture. Domestic Animals
Title 22a Chapters 439 to 446z
(Secs. 22a-1 to 22a-905i)		 Environmental Protection
Title 23 Chapters 447 to 454
(Secs. 23-1 to 23-103)		 Parks, Forests and Public Shade Trees
Title 24 Chapters 462 to 463
(Secs. 24-1 to 24-8)		 State Geological and Natural History Survey. Weather Control Board
Title 25 Chapters 473 to 485
(Secs. 25-1 to 25-238)		 Water Resources. Flood and Erosion Control
Title 26 Chapters 490 to 495
(Secs. 26-1 to 26-317)		 Fisheries and Game
V O L U M E    9
Title 27 Chapters 504 to 507
(Secs. 27-1 to 27-274)		 Armed Forces and Veterans
Title 28 Chapters 517 to 518c
(Secs. 28-1 to 28-32a)		 Civil Preparedness and Emergency Services
Title 29 Chapters 528 to 541a
(Secs. 29-1 to 29-453a)		 Public Safety and State Police
Title 30 Chapter 545
(Secs. 30-1 to 30-118)		 Intoxicating Liquors
Title 31 Chapters 556 to 577
(Secs. 31-1 to 31-901a)		 Labor
Title 32 Chapters 578 to 588hh
(Secs. 32-1 to 32-780)		 Commerce and Economic and Community Development
V O L U M E    10
Title 33 Chapters 589 to 608
(Secs. 33-1 to 33-2001)		 Corporations
Title 34 Chapters 609 to 616
(Secs. 34-1 to 34-646)		 Limited Partnerships, Partnerships, Professional Associations, Limited Liability Companies and Statutory Trusts
Title 35 Chapters 620 to 625
(Secs. 35-1 to 35-58)		 Trade Regulations, Trademarks and Collective and Certification Marks
Title 36 Chapters 634 to 662e
(Secs. 36-1 to 36-583)		 The Banking Law of Connecticut (All sections transferred or repealed)
Title 36a Chapters 664 to 669
(Secs. 36a-1 to 36a-872)		 The Banking Law of Connecticut
Title 36b Chapters 672 to 672c
(Secs. 36b-1 to 36b-80)		 Connecticut Securities Law and Business Opportunity Investment Act
Title 37 Chapter 673
(Secs. 37-1 to 37-10)		 Interest
V O L U M E    11
Title 38 Chapters 674 to 696
(Secs. 38-1 to 38-546)		 Insurance (All sections transferred, repealed or obsolete)
Title 38a Chapters 697 to 706c
(Secs. 38a-1 to 38a-1093)		 Insurance
Title 39 Repealed Negotiable Instruments (All sections repealed)
Title 40 Chapters 707 to 709
(Secs. 40-1 to 40-80)		 Warehouses and Warehouse Receipts. Trust Receipts
Title 41 Chapter 720
(Secs. 41-1 to 41-53)		 Bills of Lading
Title 42 Chapters 731 to 747
(Secs. 42-1 to 42-901)		 Business, Selling, Trading and Collection Practices
Title 42a Articles 1 to 10
(Secs. 42a-1-101 to 42a-10-109)		 Uniform Commercial Code
Title 42b Chapter 748
(Secs. 42b-1 to 42b-15)		 Registered Obligations of Public Entities
Title 43 Chapters 750 to 753
(Secs. 43-1 to 43-52)		 Weights and Measures
Title 44 Chapter 763
(Secs. 44-1 to 44-6)		 Hotel and Inn Keepers
V O L U M E    12
Title 45 Chapters 774 to 800
(Secs. 45-1 to 45-363)		 Probate Courts and Procedure (All sections transferred or repealed)
Title 45a Chapters 801 to 803a
(Secs. 45a-1 to 45a-788)		 Probate Courts and Procedure
Title 46 Chapters 808 to 811
(Secs. 46-1 to 46-65e)		 Husband and Wife (All sections transferred or repealed)
Title 46a Chapters 812 to 814g
(Secs. 46a-1 to 46a-179)		 Human Rights
Title 46b Chapters 815 to 818
(Secs. 46b-1 to 46b-580)		 Family Law
Title 47 Chapters 821 to 828a
(Secs. 47-1 to 47-304)		 Land and Land Titles
Title 47a Chapters 830 to 834
(Secs. 47a-1 to 47a-75)		 Landlord and Tenant
Title 48 Chapter 835
(Secs. 48-1 to 48-57)		 Eminent Domain
Title 49 Chapters 846 to 848
(Secs. 49-1 to 49-115)		 Mortgages and Liens
Title 50 Chapter 859
(Secs. 50-1 to 50-14)		 Lost and Unclaimed Property
Title 50a Chapters 860 to 863
(Secs. 50a-1 to 50a-203)		 International Law
V O L U M E    13
Title 51 Chapters 870 to 890
(Secs. 51-1 to 51-353b)		 Courts
Title 52 Chapters 895 to 931
(Secs. 52-1 to 52-660)		 Civil Actions
Title 53 Chapters 938 to 949g
(Secs. 53-1 to 53-454)		 Crimes
Title 53a Chapters 950 to 952
(Secs. 53a-1 to 53a-323)		 Penal Code
Title 54 Chapters 959 to 970
(Secs. 54-1 to 54-301)		 Criminal Procedure
Title 55 Chapter 978
(Secs. 55-1 to 55-4)		 Concluding Provisions
